name: Bone 'o' ween
description:
Game is about a Skeleton who has the day he has been waiting for every year, Halloween! The only night where he can go out in the wild and party with people without being feared or being looked at unearthly. But the dark world as not been kind with him by striking a lighting on the Skeleton, burning his body to crisp except for his head. But he has hope he can find parts from other skeletons lying around the cemetery to get himself a new skeleton figure to attend the party. 

Keyboard Controls

Movement – WASD

Look Around – Mouse

Shoot – Left Mouse

Aim – Right Mouse

Jump – Space

Switch Player State (After You get on the  transformation Pad) – 1, 2, 3

Will you help Skeleton join the Halloween Party?
